meanings.sent1: Her mischoice of the wrong answer cost her the game.
meanings.sent2: Making a mischoice in the dark led to confusion.
meanings.sent3: The mischoice of wearing sandals in the snow was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His mischoice of words painted a confusing picture for the audience.
meanings.sent5: The mischoice of the path through the forest left them lost for hours.

meanings.sent1: He mischose the wrong ingredients for the recipe.
